Subject: jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.

From: Bret Waldow <Bret.Waldow@...>

I have found a case where jUnit will run a test successfully if I use the
text ui, but error out if I use either of the guis.  The error shows up as a
nullPointerException in my code.

Does anyone know why the textui and guis behave differently?  Is this a bug?

I have created an example - 5 classes that form the framework of the
application.  I could post them as text ("cut here") if that would be
helpful.

This is a problem for us - our boss is on our case to make this work, so I
need to resolve this issue.

One of us uses Sun JDK1.2.2, and I am using Sun JDK1.3.1_01.  Both of us see
this issue.

Thanks in advance for any help.
Bret
subject: jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.
